attributes.additional_details:
People in their 20s will have to work until they are 70 under new plans to be announced by George Osborne.

By this, he actually means the poor manual workers. Himself, all other MP's, civil servants, bank bosses will all be retired by the age of 50 with a nice hefty pension but us labourers, the bread and butter of this land are expected to work to our grave.

It's a disgrace and we shouldn't let this happen.
